B

BaseSettings - Class in com.sensoro.beacon.kit
The beacon setting class,this class can set or get transmit power, advertising interval of the beacon.It also can control energy saving mode, password status.
BaseSettings() - Constructor for class com.sensoro.beacon.kit.BaseSettings
 
BaseSettings.AdvertisingInterval - Enum in com.sensoro.beacon.kit
The advertising interval enum of the beacon.
BaseSettings.EnergySavingMode - Enum in com.sensoro.beacon.kit
The energy saving mode enum of the beacon.
BaseSettings.TransmitPower - Enum in com.sensoro.beacon.kit
The transmit power enum of the beacon.
BatterySaveInBackground - Class in com.sensoro.beacon.kit
If you use the feature, the sdk will save power obviously,but it will affect the performance of the sdk.
BatterySaveInBackground(Application) - Constructor for class com.sensoro.beacon.kit.BatterySaveInBackground
 
Beacon - Class in com.sensoro.beacon.kit
The class of the beacon.The class can show all informantion of the beacon.
Beacon.Proximity - Enum in com.sensoro.beacon.kit
The proximity enum of the beacon.
